forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As midday unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a crisp partial sunshine graces the skyline, hinting at the city’s vibrant spirit. Though patchy drizzle danced earlier, it has mostly retreated, leaving a high near 65 degrees to rule the day. The west-southwest winds deliver a gentle kiss, gusting playfully at times, further adding to the lively atmosphere. Yet, come afternoon, temperatures may soften into the low 60s, inviting layers to your ensemble.

The marine layer still holds its ground along the fringes, cloaking the Golden Gate in a whisper of fog, while the heart of the city basks in clarity. As the skies transition into an evening of cloud cover, a low around 54 degrees beckons warmth, making a light jacket a wise companion for those venturing into the twilight. This is an afternoon well-suited for wandering the streets; perhaps a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or an open-air café experience, enjoying the lingering coolness with a book in hand. Whatever the choice, the day offers a canvas of possibility amidst its refreshing charm.
